description: '''Entombed A.D.''' was a [[Swedish death metal]] band formed in 2014, composed of former members of [[Entombed (band)|Entombed]] after their breakup. They released their debut album, ''Back to the Front'', the same year. The band's final lineup consisted of Olle Dahlstedt (drums), Nico Elgstrand (guitar), and Guilherme Miranda (guitar). They broke up after the death of singer [[Lars-GÃ¶ran Petrov]].
